name: TEKOY Inc.
description:
This game was made for Magara Jam #5 in only 3 days.

You are a  child of a pretty average family. You have a father who is a civil servant and a mother who is a teacher. But one day, your father leaves the house. Mommy says he went out to buy milk, but you never hear any news from him ever again. Until one day, years later, you get a letter....

" Your father is dead.

                      He left his estate agency to you."
